content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to Knut's personal beliefs or religious convictions. However, it is known that Knut converted to Christianity and supported the church during his reign. He promoted the construction of churches and monasteries, and his coins contained Christian symbols. Knut also established laws that were based on Christian principles, such as the protection of widows and orphans. Therefore, it can be assumed that his Christian beliefs influenced his leadership and his policies.
